name: My Cousin is Dumb
description:
Note: This ins't supossed to be a serious game, it's all a joke i made for my cousin.Can a phone run away from a person who only post dumb stuff on the internet? I bet yes.Devlog Video

Controls
ActionsControlsMovementArrow KeysJumpingSpace BarPausingEsc Key
Lore
Milena is a girl that loves funk, and uses her phone to make dumb dances and do kinda sus stuff(i think), so one day, she lost her phone, and than, the phone came to life and mad with the fact of the stupid things she do with it, runs away. Now you're controling the phone, and you need to stay away from Milena

Credits
Game made by: Fernando Broca
My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC926wiai77-ThcvJKkh0PuA/videos
